column4: Requirement Description
Scene loading time < 10 seconds
Voice delay < 150 ms
Min. 100 users on one VR server instance without FPS drop < 30
Dynamic scaling of VR instances
Support for multiple simultaneous lecture sessions
GDPR compliance for personal data
TLS 1.2+ encryption for connections
Ability to report abuse and block users
Availability >= 99% annually
Failover to backup instance within 30 seconds
Intuitive UI, onboarding time < 15 minutes
User manual accessible from main menu
Accessibility support for visually and hearing impaired users
Support for VR devices: Quest 2+, HTC Vive, WMR
2D version compatible with Chrome, Firefox, Edge
Error logging and admin monitoring
Session recovery after unexpected crash
No data loss after system updates
All updates tested in staging before production
